meanings.definition: The overall organization or arrangement of something, especially on a large scale
meanings.sent1: The macrostructures of the company ensured efficient communication between departments.
meanings.sent2: The macrostructures of the event planning were meticulously planned to ensure a smooth flow.
meanings.sent3: The macrostructures of the library made it easy for visitors to navigate through the shelves.
meanings.sent4: The macrostructures of the ecosystem resembled a delicate web of interconnected life forms.
meanings.sent5: The macrostructures of the government determined the allocation of resources across different regions.
